hero.title: Parcel delivery
hero.desc: Enjoy a fast and reliable delivery service that ensures your shipments arrive safely and on time

parcelDesc.title: Deliver packages quickly and safely to your customer
parcelDesc.desc: Parcel delivery service offers you an easy, safe way to send any package from point to another, with full tracking for every step. We receive, prepare, transport, then deliver to the desired destination accurately and on time. The service suits any activity needing reliable, fast transport solutions without any complexity

parcelFeatures.title: Discover why Femex is your top choice for parcel delivery

desc.descOne: Fast delivery within the same day or within 24-48 hours
desc.descTwo: Professional drivers trained to handle sensitive shipments
desc.descThree: SMS/WhatsApp notifications upon pickup and delivery
desc.descFour: Hand delivered with electronic signature upon receipt

howItWorks.title: How does parcel delivery work?
howItWorks.desc: A system of simple and easy steps to ensure a distinctive and reliable delivery experience

cardOne.heading: Register the request
cardOne.desc: Add parcel data and specify the receiving location

cardTwo.heading: Receiving the package
cardTwo.desc: The driver picks up the package from your company

cardThree.heading: Preparing and transporting
cardThree.desc: The parcel is sorted and the fastest route for delivery is determined

cardFour.heading: Delivery to the customer
cardFour.desc: Hand delivered with electronic signature and status updated instantly

commonQuestions.title: Questions about the parcel delivery service

questionOne.question: Can I track the status of the package?
questionOne.answer: Yes, we provide you with a dedicated tracking link that shows the status of the shipment, moment by moment

questionTwo.question: What is the delivery time?
questionTwo.answer: Delivery within the city within the same day or within 24-48 hours depending on pressure and distance

questionThree.question: Is there a minimum number of packages?
questionThree.answer: No, you can ship one package or hundreds of packages depending on your needs

questionFour.question: Can I deliver international packages?
questionFour.answer: Yes, you can deliver international packages, whether one or several packages, depending on your needs

questionFive.question: How much does delivery cost?
questionFive.answer: The cost depends on the city and weight. You can get the price immediately by contacting us

readyParcel.title: Ready to start with us?
readyParcel.desc: Book your parcel delivery now and get fast, secure, real-time shipment updates
